Banner.Description: I have 5 years of experience developing web application. I am committed to writing clean, reusable, and scalable code in Java and TypeScript, following coding best practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In 5 years of experience I have covered many roles: Fullstack Developer, Backend Developer, Frontend Developer. I am driven by a passion for leveraging my knowledge to develop innovative solutions that tackle real-world challenges.
I specialize in improving systems, optimizing websites, standardizing best practices, and contributing valuable ideas to enhance the projects I work on.
I have trained and worked with a variety of technologies, including:
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Developer
Description: Develop and fix the application’s defect based on requirements
Define coding convention and coding best practice
Reviewing code and mentoring junior members of the team to ensure code quality
Collaborate with the team leader to define and enhance code quality and code coverage, ensuring no major code smells and maintaining code coverage at 80% or above
Rewrite the application’s logic from Java 8 to TypeScript

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Developer
Description: Optimize system to handle huge traffic
Working as Backend Developer to develop, operate and maintain Momo’s airline ticketing/legacy system
Build and implement backend solutions for the Vietnam Airlines ticketing workflow
Refactor code from Vert.x to Spring

Experience.Jobs.Title: Associate Software Developer
Description: Communicate with project manager to clarify and analyze the requirements
Responsible for general development solutions in VN side
Design database schemas and implement both back-and front-end

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Gisselle
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A centralized system built with Angular and Spring to manage and secure access to all partner applications and data, offering various authentication and authorization functions.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
